title: What do you seriously enjoy about League of Legends?
body: Serious question to you all. I know that many people are frustrated with the game and all, so what makes you come back?

replies.body: I know league can feel pretty crappy if your team does bad enough to bring you down, but that feeling is balanced by how it feels to carry a crappy team. Also playing Malphite. As long as Malphite exists, there will always be joy in league.

Certain champions that are just fun to play win or lose, as well as learning and finding new champs I enjoy.  Thats why i've been playing a lot of flex lately because i don't care about my rank there so if i get a bad team/autoloss game its not a big deal and i wont tilt.

The community.  It is really great to be part of a community that works together to create a better experience for everyone.  I think it is because of how we treat each other, and our open discussions about the game and its strengths and flaws, that the development team listens to us and takes our suggestions seriously.

Mainly I don’t like the other PvP games (fuck fortnite), I want to play with my friends and I like having fun and BMing lol

I have been playing lots of God of War 4 and The Witcher 3 the past few weeks.
